com.jcodeing.kmedia.utils

Class Assert

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jcodeing.kmedia.utils.Assert

  • public final class Assert
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for asserting the truth of expressions and properties.

      • checkIndex

        public static boolean checkIndex(int index,
                                 int start,
                                 int limit)
        Parameters:
        index - The index to check.
        start - The start of the allowed range (inclusive).
        limit - The end of the allowed range (exclusive).
        Returns:
        index >= start && index < limit
        • true: if index outside the specified bounds.
        • false: if index falls outside the specified bounds.

        • checkIndex

          public static boolean checkIndex(int index,
                                 int limit)
          Parameters:
          index - The index to check.
          limit - The end of the allowed range (exclusive).
          Returns:
          index >= 0 && index < limit
          • true: if index outside the specified bounds.
          • false: if index falls outside the specified bounds.

          • checkNotEmpty

            public static boolean checkNotEmpty(java.util.Collection collection)
            Throws IllegalArgumentException if string
            Parameters:
            collection - Collection
            Returns:
            collection != null && !collection.isEmpty()
            • true: if is null or this collection contains no elements.
            • false: if non-null, non-empty.

            • reviseInterval

              public static int reviseInterval(int x,
                                 int a,
                                 int b,
                                 boolean left_open,
                                 boolean right_open)
               Open : { x | a < x < b }
 Closed : { x | a <= x <= b }
 Left-closed,right-open : { x | a <= x < b }
 Left-open,right-closed : { x | a < x <= b }
              WARNING: open interval special situation(a>b), return origin x.
              Parameters:
              left_open - True open(a < x), false closed(a <= x)
              right_open - True open(x > b), false closed(x >= b)
